note: This batch covers detailed profiles from 'Abettors' section and staff/associates

profiles.name: Story Austin Cowles
profiles.summary: Born 1981. JE's assistant/paralegal. Lives with Sara Kellen (aka Kensington). Visited JE countless times in jail 2008. Mother: Elizabeth Close Redfield Atterbury. Works at Jack Goldberger's law office (Goldberger b 1955 d 2013). Residence: 801 S Olive Ave, West Palm Beach, FL
locations: 801 S Olive Ave, West Palm Beach, FL

profiles.name: Gregory B. Taylor
profiles.summary: JE friend and business associate. CPA. Maxwell attempted to use as witness in her case against VA Roberts Giuffre.

profiles.name: Lawrence Visoski Jr.
profiles.summary: JE's pilot (till present day as of document date). Deposed Oct 15 2009. Employed by JE since 1991, paid by 'NES, LLC'. JE deeded him 40 acres of New Mexico property to build home around 1997. JE gifted him Hummer in 2005. Wife Eileen worked for JE's Florida Science Foundation one month. Residence: 1131 Pine Point Road Riviera Beach FL
locations: 1131 Pine Point Road Riviera Beach FL

profiles.name: Maritza Vasquez
profiles.summary: Former MC2 accountant. Met JLB 1998 in Miami. Sent by 'gentleman from Switzerland' to examine JLB's books for Karin Models. Worked for Karin's Miami till 2003 when became MC2. 2003 moved to NYC, worked MC2 office until 2006. Fired for inside info, charged with embezzling. Has criminal record. FBI interviewed by Agent Nesbitt 2008. Deposed June 15 2010, told Edwards Epstein's numerous condos at 301 E 66th St NYC used to house young models. Told MC2 brought underage girls from worldwide promising modeling contracts, Epstein/Brunel obtained visas, charged girls rent to live as underage prostitutes in condos.
profiles.key_testimony: 301 E 66th St condos housed young models, MC2 visa scheme for underage girls

profiles.name: Jeffrey Fuller
profiles.summary: Ran MC Square, allegedly gay. Karin Models Miami Director. Described as having cocaine problem, 'king of coke' at midnight hour on Miami party circuit. Well known among Miami bookers and models for coke habit, kept him from moving to NY or Paris. Business Address: 6 W. 14th Street

profiles.name: Frederick Rudd
profiles.summary: 2016 bought Ghislaine Maxwell's townhouse at 116 E 65th St for $15 million with wife Kim Rudd

profiles.summary: 2016 bought Ghislaine Maxwell's townhouse at 116 E 65th St for $15 million with husband Frederick Rudd

profiles.name: Cecile de Jongh
profiles.summary: Office Manager at Financial Trust Company (JE's offshore company). Simultaneously served as board member at Antilles School on St. Thomas. First wife of sitting US governor employed by convicted sex offender. Strange/unprincipled not to notify private school/parents given fiduciary/ethical responsibilities and proximity laws between predator and school-aged children. As of Jan 2016 no longer first lady but remains employed as Epstein's office manager.
profiles.ethical_concerns: Working for sex offender while on school board, did not notify parents
profiles.status_2016: No longer first lady, still Epstein's office manager

profiles.name: Janusz Banasiak
profiles.summary: Born 1953. JE's house manager. Has Montgomery County Health Dept ID (questioned why). Deposed Feb 16 2010. Wife: Beata
profiles.questions: Why does he have Montgomery County health dept ID?
